text: "Mississippi" is a 2001 country-rock song by Bob Dylan and is the second track from his album Love and Theft. It was originally recorded for his 1997 album Time Out of Mind sessions during it did not appear on track listings and was left off the album. It has been covered by Sheryl Crow for her third studio album The Globe Sessions, The Chicks and Ryan Adams. ==References== Category:1997 songs Category:Country rock songs Category:Bob Dylan songs Category:Sheryl Crow songs Category:The Chicks songs Category:Ryan Adams songs
title: Mississippi (Bob Dylan song)
